# Draft:Last War: Survival Game

Last War: Survival Game is a mobile strategy game set in a zombie apocalypse, developed by Singaporean studio FirstFun (also known as FUNFLY PTE. LTD.). The game was released globally for iOS and Android in August 2023.
Gameplay
Last War: Survival Game combines elements of base-building, resource management, and real-time strategy in a world overrun by zombies. Players must build and upgrade shelters, recruit and train heroes from three military branches, and assemble teams to fight against waves of zombies and rival players.
Key features include:
Base construction and management: Players expand their stronghold, manage resources, and lead survivors.
Hero recruitment and upgrading: The game offers a large roster of heroes, each with unique skills, which can be combined for strategic advantage.
PvE and PvP combat: Players battle zombies in story-driven missions and compete against other players in alliances.
Social alliances: The game emphasizes global cooperation and competition through alliances and large-scale events.
Development and Release
Last War: Survival Game was developed by FirstFun, a Singapore-based studio, and published under the FUNFLY PTE. LTD. label. The game launched globally on August 2, 2023, after a period of regional testing.
Commercial Performance
The game rapidly became a commercial hit. By September 2024, it had generated over $900 million in revenue, and by February 2025, it surpassed $2 billion in lifetime player spending on mobile platforms. As of mid-2025, Last War: Survival Game has been downloaded over 60 million times worldwide.
The United States, South Korea, and Japan are its largest markets. In South Korea, the game achieved the highest revenue per download ($53) and ranked as the country’s second top-grossing mobile game in 2024. The title is noted for its strong appeal across both Asian and Western markets, a rarity in the mobile gaming industry.
Reception
Last War: Survival Game has been praised for its accessible gameplay, strategic depth, and engaging social features. It holds a rating of 4.6 out of 5 stars on Google Play from over 1.2 million reviews as of July 2025. Critics and players have also noted that the game’s advertising sometimes emphasizes puzzle elements that are less prominent in actual gameplay.
